skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: ArtemisAI

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation, theme specifications, and license file. No executable code, network calls, file system access beyond reading its own theme files, or code execution capabilities. This is a content-only skill that provides design guidance.

content.user_title: Apply professional themes to slides and documents
content.value_statement: This skill provides 10 pre-designed themes with color palettes and font pairings. Apply consistent professional styling to presentation decks and documents with minimal effort. Generate custom themes on demand when existing options do not fit your needs.
actual_capabilities: Apply pre-designed themes to slide decks and documents
Access 10 curated color palettes with hex codes
Use complementary font pairings for headers and body text
Generate custom themes from natural language descriptions
Maintain color contrast and readability standards
limitations: Does not create or modify actual presentation files directly
Themes work only with artifacts that already exist
Cannot access external design files or brand guidelines

use_cases.title: Client presentation styling
use_cases.description: Create polished client presentations with consistent color schemes and professional typography

use_cases.title: Brand-consistent decks
use_cases.description: Apply matching themes across pitch decks and marketing materials for visual cohesion

use_cases.title: Engaging lecture slides
use_cases.description: Design visually appealing educational content for students and workshops

prompt_templates.title: Apply existing theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the [theme name] theme to my presentation deck

prompt_templates.title: Show all themes
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all available themes and their color palettes

prompt_templates.title: Create custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme for a [description: e.g., beach wedding] with appropriate colors and fonts

prompt_templates.title: Theme recommendation
prompt_templates.prompt: Which theme would work best for a [description: e.g., tech startup pitch] presentation

output_examples.input: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my presentation

best_practices: Preview themes using the theme showcase PDF before selection
Match theme mood to presentation purpose and audience
Generate custom themes for specific brand requirements
anti_patterns: Using overly vibrant themes for serious corporate contexts
Ignoring color contrast and accessibility guidelines
Applying multiple conflicting themes within one presentation

faq.question: What themes are included?
faq.answer: Ten pre-designed themes covering professional, creative, and natural aesthetics.

faq.question: Can I create custom themes?
faq.answer: Yes, describe your needs and the skill generates a theme with colors and fonts.

faq.question: How do I preview themes?
faq.answer: View the theme-showcase.pdf file to see all themes visually before applying.

faq.question: Do themes work with all tools?
faq.answer: Yes, themes use standard hex colors and common fonts for broad compatibility.

faq.question: Can I modify theme colors?
faq.answer: Custom themes accept specific color and font preferences during generation.

faq.question: Are themes accessible?
faq.answer: Themes are designed with contrast considerations but verify for your specific audience.
